articles.content: Before we come to Imran Khan, we must, as always, go past Javed Miandad. Pakistan cricket, as we know it today, is not cast in Imrans shadow. Miandad owns the teams identity. A street-hustlers lack o… [+13166 chars]

articles.description: Below par strike rate of openers as well as weak starts led to the end of the Men in Blue's campaign at Adelaide, shows an analysis of Indian batting performance.
articles.content:
